Barisol's Child is an Only Child

バリーゾール(バリーゾール)の(の)子(こ)供(ども)は(は)一(ひと)人(り)っ(っ)子(こ)BARIIZOORU no kodomo wa hitorikko

"But there was a problem with him."
LR

The story of Barisol's only son Behemo and only daughter Levia.

Lyrics

Versions

  • Original: The original version of the song released on Original Sin Story ―Complete Edition―.

Albums

Notes

  • As the sixth song in the Original Sin Story series, it is preceeded by moonlit bear and succeeded by Ma Survival.
